DOC.brief_summary: The patient present acute pulmonary embolism right ventricular dysfunction high risk life-threatening event must identify emergency department adequate care hospital admission . Echocardiography identify right ventricular dysfunction , test always available , echocardiographic criterion right ventricular dysfunction vary among published study . The primary purpose protocol study prognostic value cardiac biomarker , h-FABP ( heart-type Fatty Acid-Binding Protein ) , identify emergency department patient present high risk pulmonary embolism . As secondary outcome , H-FABP result compare cardiac biomarkers ( BNP , troponin ) clinical score performance previously study stratify prognosis patient pulmonary embolism emergency department .
